ResumeParserData.Experience: NatWest Group  Lead Business Analyst  Manchester, UK  2018 - Present  Lead business analysis efforts for critical projects.  Conduct comprehensive data analysis to support strategic decision-making.  Develop and document business requirements and process maps.  Facilitate stakeholder workshops to gather requirements and provide project updates.  Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and internal policies.  Key Achievements :   Successfully implemented a new compliance management system.  Developed a process improvement initiative that reduced processing time by 20%.  Santander UK  Business Analyst  Manchester, UK  2015 - 2018  Conducted data analysis to identify business improvement opportunities.  Gathered and documented business requirements for new projects.  Developed business cases and project proposals.  Provided training and support to users on new systems and processes.  Key Achievements :   Led a project to automate reporting processes, reducing manual effort by 25%.  Identified key performance indicators that helped improve operational efficiency.  Lloyds Banking Group  Junior Business Analyst  Manchester, UK  2012 - 2015  Assisted in gathering and documenting business requirements.  Conducted data analysis to support project proposals.  Supported the development and implementation of new systems.  Key Achievements :   Played a key role in the successful implementation of a new CRM system.  Improved data accuracy by developing a new data validation process.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Experienced Business Analyst with 10 years in the banking industry. Specialized in data analysis, regulatory compliance, and project management. Adept at collaborating with stakeholders to deliver projects that align with business objectives and regulatory requirements.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Emma has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Business Operations Specialists. The candidate has been working as a Lead Business Analyst at NatWest Group for the last 6.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary: Currently, Emma holds a Low Management Level position, as Lead Business Analyst at NatWest Group. from 01/01/2018 to 05/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 6.7 years in this company.
